files.patch:
@@ -0,0 +1,48 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:background="@color/colorBackground"
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <edu.hzuapps.androidworks.homeworks.net1314080903129.Net1314080903129ChatLayout
+        android:id="@+id/chat_layout"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content">
+        <!--聊天功能栏-->
+    </edu.hzuapps.androidworks.homeworks.net1314080903129.Net1314080903129ChatLayout>
+
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/chat_list"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:divider="#0000"
+        android:listSelector="@color/colorWhite">
+
+    </ListView>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:background="@color/colorWhite">
+
+        <EditText
+            android:id="@+id/edit_message"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:maxLines="4" />
+
+        <Button
+            android:id="@+id/send_message"
+            android:layout_width="100dp"
+            android:layout_height="34dp"
+            android:layout_gravity="bottom"
+            android:layout_margin="2dp"
+            android:background="@drawable/net1314080903129btn_style"
+            android:text="发送"
+            android:textColor="@drawable/net1314080903129txt_style" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,20 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <edu.hzuapps.androidworks.homeworks.net1314080903129.Net1314080903129TitleLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content">
+        <!--自定义标题栏-->
+    </edu.hzuapps.androidworks.homeworks.net1314080903129.Net1314080903129TitleLayout>
+
+    <ListView
+        android:id="@+id/user_list"
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content">
+
+    </ListView>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,63 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="match_parent"
+    android:orientation="vertical">
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/receiver_layout"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_gravity="left"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:id="@+id/left_user"
+            android:layout_width="60dp"
+            android:layout_height="60dp"
+            android:layout_margin="2dp"
+            android:src="@drawable/a" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/white_message"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+            android:background="@drawable/net1314080903129white_left9"
+            android:gravity="center"
+            android:maxEms="14"
+            android:text="《别说你懂孩子的心》"
+            android:textColor="@color/colorText"
+            android:textSize="16sp" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:id="@+id/send_layout"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_gravity="right"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/green_message"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_marginTop="10dp"
+            android:background="@drawable/net1314080903129green_right9"
+            android:gravity="center"
+            android:maxEms="14"
+            android:text="为了孩子的健康成长，具体到“打电话”这件事，父母又该如何引导，从而给孩子的“模仿”多一份帮助呢？"
+            android:textColor="@color/colorText"
+            android:textSize="16sp" />
+
+        <ImageView
+            android:id="@+id/right_user"
+            android:layout_width="60dp"
+            android:layout_height="60dp"
+            android:layout_margin="2dp"
+            android:src="@drawable/net1314080903129me" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,33 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:background="@color/colorTitle"
+    android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/title_left"
+        android:layout_width="48dp"
+        android:layout_height="48dp"
+        android:layout_gravity="left|center"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903129back_left" />
+
+    <TextView
+        android:id="@+id/title_center"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:gravity="center"
+        android:text="@string/app_title"
+        android:textColor="@color/colorFont"
+        android:textSize="24sp" />
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/title_right"
+        android:layout_width="48dp"
+        android:layout_height="48dp"
+        android:layout_gravity="right|center"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903129web_right" />
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,54 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:background="@color/colorTitle"
+    android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/text_back"
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_gravity="center"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:background="#0000"
+        android:text="《消息"
+        android:textColor="@color/colorFont"
+        android:textSize="20sp" />
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:layout_weight="1"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/user_center"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="2"
+            android:gravity="center|bottom"
+            android:text="Woider"
+            android:textColor="@color/colorFont"
+            android:textSize="18sp" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/state_center"
+            android:layout_width="match_parent"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:gravity="center"
+            android:text="手机在线 - WIFI"
+            android:textColor="@color/colorFont"
+            android:textSize="12sp" />
+
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+    <Button
+        android:id="@+id/user_change"
+        android:layout_width="48dp"
+        android:layout_height="48dp"
+        android:layout_gravity="right|center"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:background="@drawable/net1314080903129role_change" />
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file

@@ -0,0 +1,39 @@
+<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
+<LinearLayout xmlns:android="http://schemas.android.com/apk/res/android"
+    android:layout_width="match_parent"
+    android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+    android:orientation="horizontal">
+
+    <ImageView
+        android:id="@+id/user_image"
+        android:layout_width="65dp"
+        android:layout_height="65dp"
+        android:layout_margin="5dp"
+        android:src="@drawable/a" />
+
+    <LinearLayout
+        android:layout_width="match_parent"
+        android:layout_height="match_parent"
+        android:orientation="vertical">
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/user_name"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_gravity="left"
+            android:layout_margin="12dp"
+            android:layout_weight="3"
+            android:text="爱萝莉"
+            android:textColor="@color/colorName"
+            android:textSize="18dp" />
+
+        <TextView
+            android:id="@+id/user_massage"
+            android:layout_width="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_height="wrap_content"
+            android:layout_margin="5dp"
+            android:layout_weight="1"
+            android:text="附小进【提醒】你的交友圈该更新了" />
+    </LinearLayout>
+
+</LinearLayout>
\ No newline at end of file
